body_text: I did this because we are accessing prefs from more than just the extensions.shield-recipe.client sub-tree. It seemed awkward to use prefs.getCharPref in someplaces and Services.prefs.getCharPref in others, depending on which preference was being accessed.
body: I did this because we are accessing prefs from more than just the `extensions.shield-recipe.client` sub-tree. It seemed awkward to use `prefs.getCharPref` in someplaces and `Services.prefs.getCharPref` in others, depending on which preference was being accessed.
body_html: I did this because we are accessing prefs from more than just the extensions.shield-recipe.client sub-tree. It seemed awkward to use prefs.getCharPref in someplaces and Services.prefs.getCharPref in others, depending on which preference was being accessed.
